meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: This Order may be cited as the Rating (Miscellaneous Exemptions) Order.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Exemption from payment of rates
section.content: The areas and classes of tenement specified in the Schedule are exempted from the payment of rates.

section.name: s1
section.content: All tenements, or parts thereof, used wholly or mainly for the purpose of public religious worship, other than those exempt from assessment to rates under section 36(1)(d) of the Ordinance.

section.name: s2
section.content: All tenements, or parts thereof, occupied for public purposes by or on behalf of the Government or the Financial Secretary Incorporated, other than those exempt from assessment to rates under section 36(1)(f) or (h) of the Ordinance. (L.N. 307 of 1986; 78 of 1999 s. 7)

section.name: s3
section.leadIn: All tenements, or parts thereof, held by the Government or the Financial Secretary Incorporated and occupied or to be occupied as dwellings by public officers—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: by virtue of their employment; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: with the consent of the Government or the Financial Secretary Incorporated, solely for the term of their employment and otherwise than pursuant to a scheme or arrangement whereby any right or interest in the tenements is or may be acquired by them or by any other person,

section.continued: other than those exempt from assessment to rates under section 36(1)(g) of the Ordinance.
